Name: Noisy Novel
Context: Tom is attempting to complete his novel today.
Desire: Tom wants to finish his novel undisturbed.
Belief: Tom believes that his neighbor will be considerate and quite.
Outcome: Tom's neighbor constantly makes loud noise and distractions.
Action: Tom decides to knock on his neighbor's door and confronts his neighbor about the noise.
Opposing Desire: Tom hopes he can complete his novel in a noisy environment because it will inspire him more.
Opposing Belief: Tom believes that his neighbor will be loud and noisy.
Opposing Outcome: Tom's neighbor is quiet and peaceful today.
Opposing Action: Tom stays at home in peace.
